preqs: ARC2002 or DGN2003 or IDE2113 or IAR2113 or IAR2115 and OHS1000

rules.ruleString: (Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {ARC2002, DGN2003, IAR2113, IAR2115, IDE2113, IDN2001} and  Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {OHS1000})

description: This unit provides an overview of furniture design practice in Industrial Design. It outlines specific issues of the design process with particular reference to form, materials and structure. Methods of design communication and presentation are explored and applied.
faculty: Faculty of Art, Design and Architecture
